benchmarks.notes: Varies heavily by vertical: fashion 1.5-2.5%, electronics 2-4%, beauty 3-5%
Rising YoY. Paid social CAC up 20-30% in past 2 years
Subscription models see 50%+. One-time purchase verticals 15-25%
Mobile conversion typically 40-60% of desktop conversion

patterns.name: Checkout Friction Pattern
patterns.description: Each additional checkout step reduces completion by 10-15%. Guest checkout can improve conversion by 5-10%.

patterns.name: Null Search Results Pattern
patterns.description: 15-25% of site searches return zero results. Users who get null results are 3x more likely to bounce. Fixing null results typically lifts search conversion 10-20%.

patterns.name: PDP Bounce Pattern
patterns.description: High PDP bounce (>70%) often signals: poor product images, missing size/fit info, price shock, or slow load time. Image quality improvements alone can lift conversion 5-10%.

patterns.name: Promotional Dependency Pattern
patterns.description: Over-reliance on promotions erodes margin and trains customers to wait for sales. Brands running promotions >40% of the time see 10-15% lower full-price conversion.

patterns.name: CAC Channel Mix Shift
patterns.description: Rising CAC often correlates with over-reliance on paid channels. Shifting 20% of budget from paid to organic/email can reduce blended CAC by 15-25%.

patterns.name: Mobile Conversion Gap
patterns.description: Mobile conversion is typically 40-60% of desktop. Primary causes: small touch targets, complex forms, slow load, lack of mobile payment options (Apple Pay, Google Pay).

patterns.name: Size/Fit Returns Pattern
patterns.description: In fashion/apparel, 40-60% of returns are size-related. Adding size guides, fit technology, or customer reviews with fit info can reduce returns 10-20%.

patterns.name: Q4 Seasonal Surge
patterns.description: E-commerce sees 30-50% revenue spike in Q4 (Black Friday through December). Conversion rates temporarily lift 0.5-1.0pp. Site performance under load becomes critical.

patterns.name: Loyalty Program Impact
patterns.description: Points-based loyalty programs increase repeat purchase rate by 10-20% but take 6-12 months to show ROI. Tier-based programs show faster engagement but higher complexity.

patterns.name: Personalization Revenue Lift
patterns.description: Product recommendations drive 10-30% of e-commerce revenue. Personalized search results lift conversion 5-15%. Homepage personalization shows 3-8% lift.
